site.title: HIV Connect Central NJ
site.description: Comprehensive HIV care, support, and resources across Central New Jersey

hero.title: Find Your Path to Health and Wellness
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive HIV care, support, and resources across Central New Jersey. Whether you're newly diagnosed, managing HIV long-term, seeking prevention resources, or supporting someone you love, you'll find expert care and genuine community here.
hero.confidential: All services are confidential, and many are free regardless of insurance status.

serviceCategories.title: Comprehensive Care & Support
serviceCategories.subtitle: From testing to treatment, from housing to mental health support, we connect you with the services you need across Middlesex, Somerset, and Hunterdon counties.

testing.title: Testing & Prevention
testing.description: Free, confidential HIV testing with results in 20 minutes. PrEP counseling and at-home testing options available.

treatment.title: Treatment & Care
treatment.description: Expert medical care to help you live a full, healthy life. Same-day treatment initiation and telehealth options available.

caseManagement.title: Case Management
caseManagement.description: Personal support to connect you with everything you need. Your case manager is your advocate.

housing.title: Housing & Financial Support
housing.description: Emergency housing assistance, financial support, and benefits enrollment. Safe, stable housing is healthcare.

coverageArea.title: Serving Central New Jersey
coverageArea.subtitle: HIV Connect Central NJ serves residents of Middlesex, Somerset, and Hunterdon counties
coverageArea.middlesex: New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Edison, Woodbridge, and surrounding communities
coverageArea.somerset: Somerville, Franklin Township, Bridgewater, and surrounding communities
coverageArea.hunterdon: Flemington, Clinton, Lambertville, and surrounding communities

hivManageable.title: HIV is manageable
hivManageable.description: Modern treatment enables full, healthy lives. With proper care, people with HIV live long, healthy lives.

privacyMatters.title: Your privacy matters
privacyMatters.description: All HIV-related services are strictly confidential. Your information is protected by federal and state privacy laws.

careAccessible.title: Care is accessible
careAccessible.description: Most services are available regardless of insurance status. Immigration status doesn't affect your ability to receive care.

crisis.title: Need Help Right Now?
crisis.available: Available 24/7. You matter. Help is available.

findServices.title: Find HIV Care & Support Services
findServices.subtitle: Connect with trusted providers offering comprehensive HIV care, testing, treatment, and support services across Central New Jersey.
findServices.confidentialNote: All services are confidential. Many are free regardless of insurance status.

search.placeholder: Search by provider name, service, or keyword...

results.emergencyText: Call 988 for crisis support or 911 for medical emergencies

providerDirectory.title: Provider Directory
providerDirectory.subtitle: All providers listed are part of the Ryan White HIV/AIDS Program network, ensuring quality care and comprehensive services.

serviceInfo.title: Understanding HIV Services
serviceInfo.subtitle: Learn about the different types of HIV care and support services available to help you live your healthiest life.

hivTesting.title: HIV Testing
hivTesting.description: Free, confidential testing with results in 20 minutes. Pre- and post-test counseling included.

hivTreatment.title: HIV Treatment
hivTreatment.description: Modern HIV treatment helps you live a full, healthy life. Same-day treatment initiation available.

supportServices.title: Support Services
supportServices.description: Case management, mental health support, housing assistance, and more comprehensive services.

privacyNotice.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacyNotice.description: All HIV-related services are strictly confidential. Your information is protected by federal and state privacy laws. Immigration status does not affect your ability to receive care. Quality HIV care shouldn't depend on your ability to pay.

readyToStart.title: Ready to Get Started?
readyToStart.description: Contact {{providerName}} today to learn more about their services or schedule an appointment.
